course_title: Critical Issues in the Worldwide Anglican Communion
course_description: This course explores critical issues in global Anglicanism in the postmodern and postcolonial world. Particular attention will be given to the crisis of Anglican identity, the shift of Christian demographic to the Global South, human sexuality, autonomy and interdependence, mission and partnership, economic justice, and women's struggle for leadership.
